name: treasury-agent
description: Autonomous DeFi treasury agent powered by n8n, Circle Gateway & LI.FI

scripts.workflows:export: echo 'Export workflows from n8n UI to n8n/workflows/'
scripts.workflows:import: echo 'Import workflows to n8n from n8n/workflows/'
scripts.test:all: node scripts/test-discord.js && node scripts/test-appwrite.js && node scripts/test-rpc.js && node scripts/test-lifi.js
